name: nonpareil
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
better than any other: her nonpareil beauty [ after noun ] He was the teacher nonpareil.
nonpareil noun
(PERSON/THING)
[ S ] literary a person or thing that is better than any other: She was, he was convinced, the nonpareil among women.

nonpareil noun
(COLOURED SUGAR)
nonpareils
[ plural ] US (UK hundreds and thousands) small hard pieces of coloured sugar used to decorate cakes, biscuits, sweets, etc.: Garnish the cupcakes with pink and purple nonpareils.
